posts.post_content:
Asking OBO
$4,500 00 Old Mill. Minor paper loss on back. Incredible image! 
$S,OLD Sovereign bat on shoulder. Minor paper loss on back. Again incredible image!
$3,700 Sovereign portrait. Very scarce orange background. Not sure why it’s in an A holder
$3,000 Johnson. very minor paper loss on rear. Awesome front/back. 

All of these cards look near mint. Not so much the orange back, but solid card. No visible creases that I can see. Email if you are interested. 

[url]Dan@chiprop.com[/url]. Do not PM me. Thanks for looking…
